com.lqk.framework.verification
类 Validator

java.lang.Object
  com.lqk.framework.verification.Validator

public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object

A processor that checks all the Rules against their Views.

作者：
Ragunath Jawahar

嵌套类摘要
static interface Validator.ValidationListener
          Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when validate() is called.

构造方法详细信息

Validator

public Validator(java.lang.Object controller)
Creates a new Validator.

参数：
controller - The instance that holds references to the Views that are being validated. Usually an Activity or a Fragment. Also accepts controller instances that have annotated View references.
方法详细信息

put

public void put(android.view.View view,
                Rule<?> rule)
Add a View and it's associated Rule to the Validator.

参数：
view - The View to be validated.
rule - The Rule associated with the view.
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rule is null.

put

public void put(android.view.View view,
                java.util.List<Rule<?>> rules)
Convenience method for adding multiple Rules for a single View.

参数：
view - The View to be validated.
rules - List of Rules associated with the view.
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rules is null.

put

public void put(Rule<?> rule)
Convenience method for adding just Rules to the Validator.

参数：
rule - A Rule, usually composite or custom.

validate

public void validate()
Validate all the Rules against their Views.

抛出：
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If a Validator.ValidationListener is not registered.

validateAsync

public void validateAsync()
Asynchronously validates all the Rules against their Views. Subsequent calls to this method will cancel any pending asynchronous validations and start a new one.

抛出：
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If a Validator.ValidationListener is not registered.

isValidating

public boolean isValidating()
Used to find if the asynchronous validation task is running, useful only when you run the Validator in asynchronous mode using the validateAsync method.

返回：
True if the asynchronous task is running, false otherwise.

cancelAsync

public boolean cancelAsync()
Cancels the asynchronous validation task if running, useful only when you run the Validator in asynchronous mode using the validateAsync method.

返回：
True if the asynchronous task was cancelled.

getValidationListener

public Validator.ValidationListener getValidationListener()
Returns the callback registered for this Validator.

返回：
The callback, or null if one is not registered.

setValidationListener

public void setValidationListener(Validator.ValidationListener validationListener)
Register a callback to be invoked when validate() is called.

参数：
validationListener - The callback that will run.

setProperty

public void setProperty(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.Object value)
Updates a property value if it exists, else creates a new one.

参数：
name - The property name.
value - Value of the property.
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If name is null.

getProperty

public java.lang.Object getProperty(java.lang.String name)
Retrieves the value of the given property.

参数：
name - The property name.
返回：
Value of the property or null if the property does not exist.
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If name is null.

removeProperty

public java.lang.Object removeProperty(java.lang.String name)
Removes the property from this Validator.

参数：
name - The property name.
返回：
The value of the removed property or null if the property was not found.

containsProperty

public boolean containsProperty(java.lang.String name)
Checks if the specified property exists in this Validator.

参数：
name - The property name.
返回：
True if the property exists.

removeAllProperties

public void removeAllProperties()
Removes all properties from this Validator.

removeRulesFor

public void removeRulesFor(android.view.View view)
Removes all the rules for the matching View

参数：
view - The View whose rules must be removed.
